pageTitle: Do you want to apply for support with interest on a mortgage or loan secured against your home?

wantsSMI.hint: This support is paid as a loan that you must repay when your home is sold or transferred. We will send you more information and an application form by post.
wantsSMI.required: Select yes if you want to apply for support with interest on a mortgage or loan secured against your home.
wantsSMI.change: Change whether you want to apply for support with interest on a mortgage or loan secured against your home
